startApp.apologise: We are sorry, but in the beta version of the game there is no way to compete with other players!

how.title0: Get ready to memorize the picture!
how.text0: Select a mode and get ready to memorize the picture, you will only have 5 seconds to do it!
how.text1: You will have to replicate it as accurately as possible in the next round!
how.text2: You dont have much time to reproduce the drawing, hurry up!
how.text3: The application will check how close your drawing is to the original and award you points! GL

game.drawingEnded2: Lets compare your Draw with orginal image!
